lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the Rangers’ retirement of jersey numbers for Andy Bathgate and Harry Howell, who were teammates in the 1950s and ’60s, misidentified the first player to be so honored by the team. It was right wing Rod Gilbert in 1979 — not goaltender Ed Giacomin, who was the second player to have his number retired by the Rangers, in 1989.
